name: MLOps
description: Machine learning operations focusing on deployment, monitoring, and versioning of ML models in production

name: DataOps
description: Data operations focusing on automation, quality, and collaboration in data pipeline development

name: Edge Computing
description: Distributed computing paradigm bringing computation and data storage closer to data sources at network edge

name: Serverless Computing
description: Cloud computing model where applications run in stateless compute containers managed by cloud providers

name: Platform Engineering
description: Building and maintaining internal developer platforms to improve developer experience and productivity

name: Site Reliability Engineering
description: Engineering discipline applying software engineering to infrastructure and operations with focus on reliability

name: FinOps
description: Cloud financial operations focusing on cost optimization, budgeting, and financial accountability

name: Low-Code Development
description: Application development using visual interfaces and configuration instead of traditional programming

name: Bioinformatics
description: Application of computational methods to biological data analysis including genomics and proteomics

name: Geospatial
description: Geographic information systems and spatial data analysis for mapping and location-based applications

name: Audio Processing
description: Digital signal processing for audio including synthesis, effects, compression, and real-time processing

name: Video Processing
description: Video encoding, transcoding, streaming, and manipulation for media applications

name: Quantum Computing
description: Computing using quantum-mechanical phenomena like superposition and entanglement

name: Augmented Reality
description: Interactive experiences overlaying digital content on real-world environments

name: Virtual Reality
description: Immersive computer-generated 3D environments for simulation, gaming, and training

name: Computer Graphics
description: Generation and manipulation of visual content including rendering, shaders, and 3D graphics

name: Simulation
description: Creating virtual environments and physics-based models for testing, training, and research

name: Data Engineering
description: Building and maintaining data pipelines, warehouses, and infrastructure for data processing

name: Accessibility
description: Designing and developing applications usable by people with disabilities following WCAG standards

name: Internationalization
description: Designing applications to support multiple languages, locales, and cultural conventions

name: Real-time Systems
description: Systems with strict timing constraints requiring deterministic response times

name: Observability
description: Understanding system internal states through metrics, logs, and distributed tracing

name: Performance Engineering
description: Optimizing application performance through profiling, load testing, and bottleneck analysis

name: Compliance
description: Ensuring applications meet regulatory requirements like GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC 2

name: Search Engineering
description: Building and optimizing search systems including indexing, relevance tuning, and query processing
